name: Deductive AI
description: [Deductive](https://www.deductive.ai/)is the worldâ€™s first _inference-based observability platform_ that can help root-cause and mitigate large-scale software outages by reasoning about distributed systems, code, and statistical anomalies in real-time across unprecedented volumes of telemetry data (metrics, logs, traces, and events).
